lines.text: [Patsy doesn't understand why the police are pursuing them after Joyce left her fiancee at the altar]
Darling, you forget that we borrowed the bridegroom's car without his permission and that's, well, that's...
I wonder if we'll have to walk all the way to the ranch.
Oh, it's only two or three thousand miles.
Two or three thousand miles! You got me into this...
Listen, Rebecca of Sunstroke Farm, coming along was your idea.
There ought to be a law against road hogs like you!
Yeah, and there ought to be a law against women driving down the road at 100 miles an hour.
Don't you dare tell me how fast I was going, I was only going 45.
Hooray! I finally won an arguement with a woman!
